synopsis.text: The anime short, featuring the charming Platelets, made its debut in theaters alongside the feature presentation, 'Cells at Work!! The Return of the Strongest Enemy. A Huge Uproar in the Bodyâ€™s Bowels!'. This delightful short animation later found its way onto the movie's Blu-ray release, offering viewers an additional dose of fun and excitement set within the bustling world of the human body.
